attributes.action: Ask the Government not to trigger article 50 and reject the referendum result.
attributes.additional_details: Since the referendum some facts, figures & statistics given in the build up to the vote have been shown as untrue & revoked or disputed, Many people voted with their hearts & not minds being fed via misleading propaganda & a sense that they just wanted to be heard, Having had time to digest the outcome the peoples attitude & realization of the effects has sunk in, Many would have voted differently & the outcome would now change. The vote was not a true reflection of the majority.
attributes.background: On grounds that the people did not have accurate knowledge of the facts & figures on which to cast their vote, the referendum was rushed & a lack of factual data led to the outcome. The referendum was a defiant vocal vote based on a fictional statistics, if re-run the outcome would be different .
